Panzer::
She growled. "No, I don't want to die. I don't want to be 
reprogrammed either."  as she tried to struggle free again. She said, 
strain showing in her voice, "max...i...mals...will....prevail.." 
trying to squirm free from the clutches of the dragon. 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Luzbel::
> 
> "Do you rather die then???" said devily Luzbel "You haven't other 
> choice: or you're a predacon or you die. What do you choose?"
>
